CustomField.formula: (CASE( Set_the_Agenda__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Last_Meeting_Action_Items__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Ongoing_Social_Content_Review__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Data_Studio_Report__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE( Top_Keywords__c , 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Inbound_Strategy__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(State_of_Inbound_Pipeline__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(CFS_Score__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Industry_Sales_Business__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Referrals_Additional_Services__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Recap_Action_Items__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0)+ CASE(Confirm_Next_Meeting_Date__c, 'Yes',2, 'Somewhat',1, 'No',0, 0))/(24- (CASE( Last_Meeting_Action_Items__c , "NA",2, 0)+ CASE( Ongoing_Social_Content_Review__c , "NA",2, 0)+ CASE( Industry_Sales_Business__c, "NA",2, 0)+ CASE( Recap_Action_Items__c , "NA",2, 0)))
CustomField.label: DSM Calibration Call Score
